explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: updated all collections, variables, and recursive calls to consistently use the generic type parameter <T>, eliminating Integer-specific types and raw-type issues.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: none
refactoring: converted the method from static to an instance method of PowerSet<T> and generalized the signature, local variables, and collections from Integer to T while preserving the original algorithm.
misc: added a brief Javadoc comment describing that the method returns the power set of the input set.
